official_title: Relating to a White House conference on water resources.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should convene a White House conference on water resources to focus national attention on water and the need to develop a national policy which ensures its availability for current and future generations.

titles.title: Relating to a White House conference on water resources.
